flawed_nl_solution:
Three fewer trumpets than Miles has fingers is 10-3=<<10-3=6>>6 trumpets.
Two more guitars than he has hands is 2+2=<<2+2=4>>4 guitars.
Two more trombones than he has heads is 2+1=<<2+1=3>>3 trombones.
And one fewer French horn than he has guitars is 4-1=<<4-1=3>>3 French horns.
Altogether, Miles owns 6+4+3+3=<<6+4+3+3=16>>16 musical instruments.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
